dcterms:description: A multi-centre polyp detection and segmentation dataset for generalisability assessment, comprising both single frames and sequence frames from over 300 unique patients across six different medical centers.
dcterms:title: PolypGen

dcterms:creator: S. Ali
N. Ghatwary
D. Jha
E. Isik-Polat
G. Polat
O. Yang
dcterms:description: Test dataset comprising of hand-selected images from colonoscopy videos from an unseen center, presenting a challenging generalisability problem.
dcterms:title: C6-SIN

dcterms:creator: S. Ali
N. Ghatwary
D. Jha
E. Isik-Polat
G. Polat
O. Yang
dcterms:description: Test dataset consisting of sequence data from an unseen center, mimicking the natural occurrence of the colonoscopy procedure.
dcterms:title: C6-SEQ

dcterms:creator: S. Ali
N. Ghatwary
D. Jha
E. Isik-Polat
G. Polat
O. Yang
dcterms:description: Test dataset including frames from seen centers (C1-C5) with both positive and negative samples, presenting a challenging generalisability problem.
dcterms:title: C1-5-SEQ
